original_title: Jump Little Children Live at the Music Farm
overview: A concert and skits by the band Jump Little Children at the Music Farm in Charleston, SC.  Live performance at the Music Farm in Charleston, SC PLUS a skit where each band member performs and at the end of the DVD you pick your favorite member....also bonus footage from their North American tour including skiing in Colo., synchronized swimming in Salt Lake City and singing of the National Anthem in Boston. Copyright 2002
title: Jump Little Children Live at the Music Farm
